**Granted Powers:** Add [[Appraise (Skill)|Appraise]], [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]], and [[Sense Motive (Skill)|Sense Motive]] to your list of cleric class skills.

**Pact Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Command (Spell)|Command]]****:** One subject obeys selected command for 1 round.

**2** **[[Shield Other (Spell)|Shield Other]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** You take half of subjectâ€™s damage.

**3** **[[Speak with Dead (Spell)|Speak With Dead]]****:** Corpse answers one question/2 levels.

**4** **[[Divination (Domain)|Divination]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Provides useful advice for specific proposed action.

**5 [[Stalwart Pact (Spell)|Stalwart Pact]] <sup>M</sup>:** You gain combat bonuses automatically when reduced to half hit points or lower.

**6 [[Zealot Pact (Spell)|Zealot Pact]] <sup>X</sup>:** You automatically gain combat bonuses when you attack someone of opposite alignment.

**7** **[[Renewal Pact (Spell)|Renewal Pact]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Creature is automatically healed if adverse condition affects it.

**8** **[[Delayed Resurrection (Spell)|Delayed Resurrection]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Deity brings subject back from the dead automatically.

**9** **[[Gate (Spell)|Gate]]** **<sup>X</sup>:** Connects two planes for travel or summoning.
